TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit StrokeCollectionConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

span.span: Converts a to a string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将转换到一个字符串，表示采用 base-64 编码的墨迹序列化格式 (ISF)。The converts a to a string that represents the in base-64, encoded Ink Serialized Format (ISF). 很有帮助墨迹数据存储为 base-64 编码 ISF 时不能存储原始字节数据，例如在网页中。It is useful to store ink data as base-64, encoded ISF when it is not possible to store raw byte data, such as in Web pages. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将转换到的 base-64 的、 已编码 ISF 字符串。The following example demonstrates how to convert a base-64, encoded ISF string to a . 这假设没有调用`presenter`。This assumes that there is an called `presenter`. [!code-csharp[InkEraser#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/InkEraser/CSharp/InkEraser.cs#8)] [!code-vb[InkEraser#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/InkEraser/VisualBasic/InkEraser.vb#8)] [!code-csharp[InkEraser#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/InkEraser/CSharp/InkEraser.cs#3)] [!code-vb[InkEraser#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/InkEraser/VisualBasic/InkEraser.vb#3)]
